pageHeader.subtitle: >- Print design, display booth graphics, and video demonstrations for Las Vegas trade shows.
pageHeader.description: >- SP controls created Classroom present AV presentation control systems so that they would control projectors, projection screens, internal controlled lighting, audio, whiteboards, electronic whiteboards, and so on, So I design Designed collateral and materials for trade shows Where SP Controls would demo their products.

projectInfo.results: Presented at the Design designer(s) exhibition, part of the 'Lille World Design Capital 2020'.
